---
id: quickstart
title: Quickstart
---

This guide walks you through setting up and using **ProtonX** to create text embeddings.

### Get Your API Key

1. Visit [ProtonX Platform](https://platform.protonx.io/) to sign up.
2. Generate your API key from the dashboard.
3. Save the key securely for use in your application.

### Example: Creating a Text Embedding

Below is an example of how to use the **ProtonX** Python library to convert text into a vector embedding.

```python
from protonx import ProtonX

# Initialize the ProtonX client with your API key
client = ProtonX(api_key="your_api_key")

# Create an embedding
text = "ProtonX converts text into embeddings super fast."
result = client.embeddings.create(text)
```
